messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: cribs
messages.msgSnippet: LOL! We bought our dog a big dog bed to sleep on, and she just humps it! As long as it gets used! -- Amy Nelson Mama to Accalia (6/14/99) The hardest to learn
messages.messageBody:
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: cribs LOL! We bought our dog a big dog bed to sleep on, and she just humps it! As long as it gets used!

--
Amy Nelson
Mama to Accalia (6/14/99)
"The hardest to learn was the least complicated." - The Indigo Girls

My sons crib was a $300 cat bed, they loved it!
~Shelley

messages.msgSnippet: Here is an interesting article on getting rid of cribs.  It is by the person who operates the naturalchild.com site.
messages.messageBody:

person who operates the naturalchild.com site.

Joel

All children behave as well as they are treated. The Natural Child
Project http://naturalchild.com/home/

Work together to reinvent justice using methods that are fair; which
conserve, restore and even create harmony, equity and good will in
society i.e. restorative justice.
We are the prisoners of the prisoners we have taken - J. Clegg
